Salaries & personnel costs, travel costs, internal workshops, consultants to support staff capacities (not directly linked to other outputs) in Education Section., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 5. By 2021, boys and girls of school-going age demonstrate improved learning outcomes as a result of equitable and inclusive access to quality education.
